text: Song Mi-jin (born March 23, 1983), known as Emily Song is a South Korean singer and actress. She is a member of Taiwanese girl group Dream Girls. ==Discography== ===Dream Girls=== ==Filmography== ===Television series=== {| class="wikitable" style="width:600px" |- ! width=10|Year ! Title !
